ayah: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,
From the evil of the retreating whisperer[2016] -
footnotes: [2016] i.e., a devil who makes evil suggestions to man but disappears when one remembers AllƒÅh.

ayah: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -
From among the jinn and mankind."[2017]
footnotes: [2017] Evil prompters may be from men as well as from jinn.
